channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Deian a Loli
channel.desc: Tydi Deian methu'n l?n ? dod o hyd i Nedw Napan, a does dim ffiars i fod o am fynd i aros i dy Nain a Taid heb ei ffrind cwtchlyd. Nedw Napan is missing and he's needed for bedtime.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Rhaid i'r Octonots rwystro dau ferdysyn mantis rhag ymladd cyn i'w crafangau cryfion chwalu'r Octofad. The Octonauts must stop two mantis shrimps fighting before they destroy the Octopad.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Fferm Fach
channel.desc: Mae Cai yn mynd ar antur i Fferm Fach i weld madarch o bob lliw a llun yn cael eu tyfu. Cai goes on an adventure to Fferm Fach to see all sorts of wonderful mushrooms being grown.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach...
channel.desc: Byddwn yn teithio i Baris i ddysgu am Pierre Lallement, y dyn wnaeth greu'r beic gyda phedalau nol yn 1863. We learn how bikes work and about the different types, such as motorbikes.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sali Mali
channel.desc: Mae Sali Mali mewn penbleth wrth weld olion traed dieithr ar garreg y drws ac mae'n canfod mai rhai broga ydyn nhw. Sali Mali is puzzled by mysterious footprints on her door step.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Jen a Jim Pob Dim
channel.desc: Mae Jen a'r llong danfor yn ei chael hi'n anodd dilyn cyfarwyddiadau. Jen and the Submarine are having difficulty understanding directions. Can Jim & Capten Carys help them learn the basics.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Patr?l Pawennau
channel.desc: Mae'r Pawenlu yn mynd i'r jyngl i helpu eu ffrind Teifi i ddod o hyd i'w barot. The PAW Patrol heads to the jungle to help their friend Teifi find his lost parrot.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: A fydd criw o forladron bach Ysgol Pen-y-Garth yn llwyddo i helpu Ben Dant a Cadi i drechu Capten Cnec a chipio'r ynys yn ?l? Ben Dant and Cadi need help from Ysgol Pen-y-Garth's pirates.

channel.name: S4C UK

channel.desc: Yng nghanol y goedwig, allwch chi glywed yr holl synau gwahanol? Ma Harmoni, Melodi a Bop eisiau gwybod pwy sy'n swnio fel ffliwt. Harmoni, Melodi and Bop wonder who makes a hooting sound.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sam T?n
channel.desc: Mae'n ben-blwydd Sam ac mae pawb wedi trefnu anrheg arbennig iddo, Jiwpityr bach trydanol. It's Sam's birthday and the crew arrange a present for him, a small electronic version of Jupiter.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cacamwnci
channel.desc: Cyfres gomedi i blant meithrin sy'n cynnwys sgetsys, eitemau doniol, j?cs a chymeriadau dwl newydd sbon. A comedy show for pre-school children, full of sketches, jokes and fun.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sion y Chef
channel.desc: Mae Sam a Si?n yn byrddio'r Macrell Frithog i chwilio am gorgimychiaid ond mae'r pysgota'n mynd ar chw?l gyda'r tywydd! Sam Spratt takes Si?n out on the Merry Mackerel to catch prawns.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: LEGO ? Ffrindiau
channel.desc: Mae'r merched dal yn erlid Pransky, yr arist graffiti, ac mae'r erlid yn eu harwain i'r goedwig. An attempt to catch a graffiti artist leads to a forest fire in the woods.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Tekkers
channel.desc: Y capteiniaid Heledd Anna, Lloyd Lewis a Huw Owen sy'n herio dau d?m newydd i brofi eu Tekkers p?l-droed. Ysgol Bro Caereinion and Ysgol y Bannau are this week's teams going head to head.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion Ni
channel.desc: Newyddion i bobl ifanc. News programmes for youngsters.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y S?n
channel.desc: Yn y bennod yma, byddwn yn cyfarfod cynllunydd theatr dawnus, ac yn dysgu am ddrymiau ym Mhont-y-clun. Today, we learn about the history of zines, and take a walk around Merthyr Tydfil.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: Mae Anna wedi cyrraedd pen ei thennyn. Mae hi mewn trafferthion mawr ac wyr hi ddim beth i'w wneud. When Mair, Beca and Ioan discover what Anna is planning, they decide to tell Elen.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Byd ar Bedwar
channel.desc: Cyfres materion cyfoes gyda straeon o Gymru a'r byd. Current affairs series with stories from around Wales and the world.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Garddio a Mwy
channel.desc: Cawn ymweliad ? Menter Bwyd Sir Gar gyda Adam, a Meinir sy'n plannu bylbiau i gael toreth o liw Hydrefol. This week Sioned seeks advice about how to look after the grapevines at Pont y Twr.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion S4C a'r Tywydd. S4C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cefn Gwlad
channel.desc: Cwrddwn ? Llysgennad y Sioe Fawr eleni, Rhys Griffith - ffarmwr ifanc, dyn busnes a bridiwr ceffylau. We meet young farmer and businessman Rhys - 2025's Royal Welsh Ambassador.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: SEICLO
channel.desc: Cymal 10 - Uchafbwyntiau'r dydd o'r Tour de France. Stage 10 - The day's highlights from the Tour de France.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: It's My Shout
channel.desc: Rhaglen ddogfen yn dathlu angerdd ffyrnig a chyfeillgarwch band o ferched Cymraeg, i gyd dros 50 oed. Documentary celebrating the passion and camaraderie of an over-50 Welsh women's band.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Gronyn Gobaith
channel.desc: Stori ryfeddol arbrawf mwya'r byd yn CERN, lle mae ffisegwyr o Gymru yn allweddol. The remarkable story of the biggest physics experiment in the world, where Welsh scientists are key.
